===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|*菠蘿蜜|[[paramita]]; [[jackfruit]]}}. The shortening was possibly influenced by reanalysis of the original word as {{lang|zh|菠蘿}} + {{lang|zh|蜜}}, resulting in the dropping of {{zh-l|*蜜|honey}}.
